text: The 2010 US Open Men's Singles Qualifying stage was a pre-tournament, played by competitors who were not automatically qualified for the main draw. ==Seeds== # Marsel İlhan (First Round) # Go Soeda (First Round) # Karol Beck (First Round) # Édouard Roger-Vasselin (First Round) # Simone Bolelli (First Round) # Grega Žemlja (First Round) # Adrian Ungur (First Round) # David Guez (Qualifying Round) # Ričardas Berankis (Qualifier) # Rui Machado (Second Round) # Federico del Bonis (First Round) # Stéphane Bohli (Second Round) # Martin Fischer (First Round) # Ilija Bozoljac (Qualifying Round) # Ramón Delgado (Second Round) # João Souza (First Round) 17. Josselin Ouanna (Second Round) 18. Carlos Salamanca (First Round) 19. Stefan Koubek (Second Round) 20. Thiago Alves (First Round) 21. Daniel Muñoz-De La Nava (Qualifying Round) 22. 'Robert Kendrick (Qualifier) 23. 'Ivan Dodig (Qualifier) 24. 'Kei Nishikori (Qualifier) 25. Kevin Kim (Qualifying Round) 26. Adrian Mannarino (Qualifier) 27. Conor Niland (Second Round) 28. Rajeev Ram (First Round) 29. Uladzimir Ignatik (Second Round) 30. Izak van der Merwe (First Round) 31. Mischa Zverev (First Round) 32.
